content:
Message Formats

  • Structured versus unstructured

    • Strings versus records

  • Strings offer more flexibility

    • Decoding formats do checking
      • Same strings used for selectivity
    • Easy to add new information to
    • Easy to send and debug
      • No byte-order problems
      • Easy to trace, compose messages, etc.
      • Easier to add new tools
